name: ngBoba
body:
### About
Angular provides powerful dependency management but it does nothing for shipping those dependencies.
ngBoba aims to fill that void and leverage the existing project dependency information to create bundles!

### Grunt Plugin
We created a [grunt plugin](http://github.com/ng-boba/grunt-ng-boba) to make it easy to use ngBoba. We also created an [example project](http://github.com/ng-boba/ng-boba-sandbox) that demonstrates how to bundle angular dependencies and concatenate them in a single file.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
